description: Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: While Stealth is active and for 4 sec after breaking Stealth, your Critical Strike chance is increased by 100%.
Equip: While Bladestorm is active, you automatically cast a total of 2 Mortal Strikes at random nearby enemies.
Equip: Rip damage has a 4% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite free and deal the maximum damage.
Equip: Reduce Sanity loss within the Visions of N'Zoth by 80%.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Agility by 180 for 15 sec. Requires the Heart of Azeroth. (Requires level 50 or below)
Use: Dispel any effects of N'Zoth's Corruption, and become immune to any further Corruption effects for 6 sec. (3 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.

Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Equip: Holy Shock protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 18 sec, absorbing damage equal to 20% of the Holy Shock every 6 sec. Can protect up to 5 targets.
Equip: You gain 33% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Equip: Starsurge and Starfall reduce the cost of Starsurge and Starfall by 10% and increase their damage by 10% for 5 sec, stacking up to 2 times.
